I think I’ll just let the staff order drinks, and hopefully they dont go overboard


On Nov 22, 2024, at 6:22 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Perfect! Sent to the kitchen staff. And remind me, were you planning on getting drink tickets?

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Fri, Nov 22, 2024 at 6:20 PM Dina Kulik <drdinakulik@gmail.com> wrote:
Thank you
apps: corn, bruschetta, cauliflower wings
sides: fries and rice
mains: jerk chicken, shrimp, squash
dessert: churros and flan

thanks!


On Nov 22, 2024, at 6:16 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Dina,
For apps, our most popular are mexican street corn, mixed greens, bruschetta and cauliflower wings, (can choose 3 apps)

Sides, I'd say it's up to your the preference of your group, but mexican rice and fries are often selected (can pick 2 sides)

For mains, we'd recommend the jerk chicken, grilled shrim , adobo pulled pork and butternut squash (can pick 3 mains)

For dessert, would recommend the churros and flan! (can pick 2)


TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Fri, Nov 22, 2024 at 5:53 PM Dina Kulik <drdinakulik@gmail.com> wrote:
We can do the buffet plated for 22 please
what are your best sellers?
I can choose the number of dishes on that sheet you sent?


On Nov 22, 2024, at 11:03 AM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Got it! Can you select today? Here are the options:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 9:52 PM Dina Kulik <drdinakulik@gmail.com> wrote:
Yes for sure we need catering. I think you said we can choose this week 



Dina M. Kulik, MD, FRCPC, PEM
Founder and Director, Kidcrew
Assistant Professor, Department of Pediatrics
University of Toronto

On Nov 21, 2024, at 9:31 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

﻿
Hi Dina,

Sorry do you mean catering? I thought in previous discussions you weren’t planning on it but happy to add if that’s what you’re looking for 


TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 9:25 PM Dina Kulik <drdinakulik@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi
When do I pick the menu?


On Nov 16, 2024, at 9:50 AM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

You can see costs here! eattaco.ca/menu. Mocktails are $6-$8

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Sat, Nov 16, 2024 at 9:27 AM Dina Kulik <drdinakulik@gmail.com> wrote:
Thanks
How much are non-alcoholic drinks?


On Nov 13, 2024, at 10:50 PM, info@eattaco.ca wrote:

Hi Dina,

We're thrilled to have you! We've received your deposit and are looking forward to your event.

Most drinks are $7-8 and cocktails are $15.

Feel free to contact us with any further questions!

Best,
TacoTaco Events Team

----- Original Message -----

From: Dina Kulik

Subject: Re: Event Contract 11/24/2024

Thanks
I sent a deposit. We are very excited to come!
How much are cocktails?
Just want to plan alcohol costs :)


On Nov 13, 2024, at 8:45 AM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

No sorry I just double checked, this is what drink package is:

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

On Nov 12, 2024, at 9:12 AM, <info@eattaco.ca> <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Dina Kulik, 
    
Please see attached for the event contract. The contract has been pre-filled but if you can't see the details, please view the contract on a computer rather than a phone. Let me know if you have any questions otherwise you can simply respond to this email saying that you accept it, and attach a picture of your ID (we only need a picture of your face and your name). To fully reserve the date, please transfer the deposit to info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'November24'.
        
TacoTaco Events Team 
TacoTaco

Thank you
apps: corn, bruschetta, cauliflower wings
sides: fries and rice
mains: jerk chicken, shrimp, squash
dessert: churros and flan

thanks!


On Nov 22, 2024, at 6:16 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Dina,
For apps, our most popular are mexican street corn, mixed greens, bruschetta and cauliflower wings, (can choose 3 apps)

Sides, I'd say it's up to your the preference of your group, but mexican rice and fries are often selected (can pick 2 sides)

For mains, we'd recommend the jerk chicken, grilled shrim , adobo pulled pork and butternut squash (can pick 3 mains)

For dessert, would recommend the churros and flan! (can pick 2)


TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

On Nov 22, 2024, at 11:03 AM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Got it! Can you select today? Here are the options:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

TacoTaco Events Team

A few updates:

Thank you so much and let me know if you have any questions.

Hi Karima,

Hope you had a great weekend as well! Apologies for delay in response, absolutely - we can put a hold on November 26th for you. We will also let you know if there's any other inquiries that come in, but you have a hold until Nov 1st.

To secure the space, we send you a contract to review, and if all looks good, we ask for a deposit of 50% of the rental fee to secure it. Our preference is e-transfer but we can take credit card payment too (just FYI there is a 2.8% card fee on it). For cancellations, you can get a full refund up to 3 weeks prior to the event, but there can be some flexibility with that given you're close to the 3 week timeframe. Rescheduling the event incurs no penalty, it's just based on availability. For set-up, we allow up to 45 mins prior to the event to set-up.

If you'd like, I can send you a contract so your team has it while reviewing/finalizing? I'd just need to know the timeframe you're looking to book so I can add it to the contract.

TacoTaco Events Team

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu<http://eattaco.ca/menu>. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.



TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

On Thursday, November 21, 2024, <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Sylvie,

Thank you for your interest in celebrating your birthday at TacoTaco! We're so glad Chuchu could help you.

Here's some information to help you plan your event on December 21st from 11 pm to 2 am:

**Venue Options:**

* **Moonlight Lounge:** This space can comfortably accommodate 150 guests and has a dance floor, professional sound system, karaoke, party lights, a smoke machine, a private bar with two bartenders, and private washrooms. It's available until 2:00 am. Rental is $150 per hour on Friday and Saturday and has a minimum spend of $2000.
* **Dining Room:** This more intimate space accommodates up to 50 guests. It's available until 2:30 am and has a rental rate of $125 per hour on Friday and Saturday and a minimum spend of $1000.

Since your event falls on a Friday, the minimum spends would apply.

**Next Steps:**

1. **Choose your venue:** Let us know which space you prefer.
2. **Estimate your guest count:** This will help us determine the best food and beverage options for your budget.
3. **Review our menus:** Our full menu is available at eattaco.ca/menu. We offer various options, including light appetizers ($6 per person), tacos and appetizers ($10-16 per person), and a full plated buffet ($30 per person). We also offer different bar options (cash bar, drink tickets, or open bar with limits). This does not need to be determined until prior 1 week prior to the event
4. **Contract and Deposit:** Once you've finalized your preferences, we'll draft a contract. A 50% deposit of the rental rate is required to secure your booking. You can arrive 30 minutes early to set up.

Please let us know if you have any questions

Sincerely,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

I’d love to my birthday here on December 21st from 11-2am (maybe a bit earlier to set up) 

Please let me know any details you have for me and next steps for booking it!

Thank you, 

Sylvie

On Nov 19, 2024, at 5:50 PM, info@eattaco.ca wrote:

﻿ Subject: Re: Excited for your event on November 22nd

Hi Alex,

Thanks for getting back to us!

To answer your questions:

* **Regular Food Menu:** Yes, our regular food menu will be available for your guests to order from. Keep in mind our kitchen closes at 10:30pm.
* **End Time:** The 1:00 AM time is when the event ends yes. There's some leniency in guests leaving for 30 mins and clean up!
* **Music Setup:** You can send your Spotify playlist to us in advance so we can have it ready. The sound system uses Bluetooth, so you don't need to physically plug anything in.
* **Patio Access:** Access to the patio is included with your booking. Cornhole is fine, just ensure it is removed by the end of the night.
* **Balloon Setup:** We recommend arriving 30 minutes before your event start time (8:30 pm) to set up your balloons. There may be some dine-in guests still present.
* **Outside Food:** You may bring in cupcakes.

We look forward to your event! Please send the remaining balance at your earliest convenience.

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

I think that's all the questions I have for now! I understand I still owe the remaining half of the balance, I will send that over to you in the next day or so.

Thank you,

Alex

subject: UofT Industrial Engineering Iron Ring Party March 15, 2025
text:
Hi,

My name is Jasmine and I am reaching out on behalf of the Industrial Engineering Club at UofT.  We have hosted our annual Iron Ring party at Taco Taco the past 3 years, with very positive enjoyment and feedback.

I am reaching out to enquire about your venue's availability for the evening of Saturday March 15, 2025. We are looking to host an event for approximately 120 students with an open bar, catering, and a DJ. If you could provide details about what would be included and the cost, that would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Jasmine Zhan

On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 6:20 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Nya,

 

Sounds good for light catering! I'll let the staff know.

 

We should be able to make those two drinks. I'll confirm with the staff and let you know at the latest tomorrow. If we do give the go ahead, feel free to bring a mini sign to promote it at the bar. 

 

We actually use the alleyway for the Moonlight Lounge. We'll have security during your event and once given the go ahead, they'll lead your guest through the alleyway which leads directly to the Moonlight Lounge

 

Karaoke would be set up on the same system yes. We do have an app for the karaoke so you'd just use our tablet for that. 


TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

 

 

On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 10:48 AM Nya Munnick <nyamunnick@gmail.com> wrote:

Hi!

 

Updated headcount is 40 people. I would like to order catering as well please, and go with the appetizer option for $6 a person. 

 

Would it be possible to offer 2 custom drink options at the bar? Here's what I was thinking: 

- Somaek (30% grape soju 70% beer) 

- French 75 (https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a38848982/french-75-cocktail/) 

 

If these two options are possible, would I be able to bring in a mini sign to promote these menu items or do you have something I could use?

 

Also, is the only entry/exit into Moonlight Lounge through Taco Taco? I just want to be able to provide my guests with clear instructions as I was a little confused myself when I visited last week. 

 

Lastly, does the Karaoke set up to the same speaker that my phone would be connected to for music? 

 

Thank you! 

 

On Sat, Nov 16, 2024 at 2:49 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Nya,

We're so excited for your birthday party at the Moonlight Lounge on November 22nd from 9:00 PM to 1:00 AM!  We received your deposit and you're all set. To help us finalize the arrangements, could you please give us an updated headcount?

Also, would you like catering? We can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference.

We look forward to seeing you for your venue visit on November 14th at 8 PM! Let us know if you have any other questions.


Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

On Thursday, November 21, 2024, <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Sylvie,

Thank you for your interest in celebrating your birthday at TacoTaco! We're so glad Chuchu could help you.

Here's some information to help you plan your event on December 21st from 11 pm to 2 am:

**Venue Options:**

* **Moonlight Lounge:** This space can comfortably accommodate 150 guests and has a dance floor, professional sound system, karaoke, party lights, a smoke machine, a private bar with two bartenders, and private washrooms. It's available until 2:00 am. Rental is $150 per hour on Friday and Saturday and has a minimum spend of $2000.
* **Dining Room:** This more intimate space accommodates up to 50 guests. It's available until 2:30 am and has a rental rate of $125 per hour on Friday and Saturday and a minimum spend of $1000.

Since your event falls on a Friday, the minimum spends would apply.

**Next Steps:**

1. **Choose your venue:** Let us know which space you prefer.
2. **Estimate your guest count:** This will help us determine the best food and beverage options for your budget.
3. **Review our menus:** Our full menu is available at eattaco.ca/menu. We offer various options, including light appetizers ($6 per person), tacos and appetizers ($10-16 per person), and a full plated buffet ($30 per person). We also offer different bar options (cash bar, drink tickets, or open bar with limits). This does not need to be determined until prior 1 week prior to the event
4. **Contract and Deposit:** Once you've finalized your preferences, we'll draft a contract. A 50% deposit of the rental rate is required to secure your booking. You can arrive 30 minutes early to set up.

Please let us know if you have any questions

Sincerely,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

New enquiry from Maria Rodriguez

 
Event type:Bar
Date and time:Sat, Feb 1, 2025 at 8:00 pm - 2:00 am
Guests:35
  Tropical Themed Space at TacoTaco
 
Message from Maria Rodriguez:
I’d love to host my 30th birthday party in February at your location. Wanted to inquire whether February 2, 2025 is available to book. Could you advise what I’d be looking at in terms of a minimum spend? Could the subtotal of all attendees count towards the minimum spend? Is food/catering a requirement of the booking?
Send a direct reply
 

Maria Rodriguez’s direct email address for your records:
maria.rodriguez.u2025676@reply.tagvenue.com

 
 
 

T&C’s highlights

  • You must at all times provide the same prices that you offer directly to general public or on your own website
  • All prices should include Tagvenue commission (not to be added on top of the standard price)
  • Your venue has accepted our T&Cs
 
 
 

Response metrics

  • Venues with high response rate rank higher and get more business
  • If your venue is not available or you get an unsuitable enquiry, decline it rather than just letting it expire with no answer
  • This enquiry automatically expires on Wed, Nov 27, 2024 at 4:43 am

On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 7:23 PM Nya Munnick <nyamunnick@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi! 

Thank you for the info :)

Any updates on the drinks? Also, I was wondering if bottles are sold at the bar, and if so what the options are?

Thanks! 
Nya 

On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 6:20 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Nya,

Sounds good for light catering! I'll let the staff know.

We should be able to make those two drinks. I'll confirm with the staff and let you know at the latest tomorrow. If we do give the go ahead, feel free to bring a mini sign to promote it at the bar. 

We actually use the alleyway for the Moonlight Lounge. We'll have security during your event and once given the go ahead, they'll lead your guest through the alleyway which leads directly to the Moonlight Lounge

Karaoke would be set up on the same system yes. We do have an app for the karaoke so you'd just use our tablet for that. 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 10:48 AM Nya Munnick <nyamunnick@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi!

Updated headcount is 40 people. I would like to order catering as well please, and go with the appetizer option for $6 a person. 

Would it be possible to offer 2 custom drink options at the bar? Here's what I was thinking: 
- Somaek (30% grape soju 70% beer) 
- French 75 (https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a38848982/french-75-cocktail/) 

If these two options are possible, would I be able to bring in a mini sign to promote these menu items or do you have something I could use?

Also, is the only entry/exit into Moonlight Lounge through Taco Taco? I just want to be able to provide my guests with clear instructions as I was a little confused myself when I visited last week. 

Lastly, does the Karaoke set up to the same speaker that my phone would be connected to for music? 

Thank you! 

On Sat, Nov 16, 2024 at 2:49 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Nya,

We're so excited for your birthday party at the Moonlight Lounge on November 22nd from 9:00 PM to 1:00 AM!  We received your deposit and you're all set. To help us finalize the arrangements, could you please give us an updated headcount?

Also, would you like catering? We can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference.

We look forward to seeing you for your venue visit on November 14th at 8 PM! Let us know if you have any other questions.


Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

Hi! 

Thank you for the info :)

Any updates on the drinks? Also, I was wondering if bottles are sold at the bar, and if so what the options are?

Thanks! 
Nya 

On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 6:20 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Nya,

Sounds good for light catering! I'll let the staff know.

We should be able to make those two drinks. I'll confirm with the staff and let you know at the latest tomorrow. If we do give the go ahead, feel free to bring a mini sign to promote it at the bar. 

We actually use the alleyway for the Moonlight Lounge. We'll have security during your event and once given the go ahead, they'll lead your guest through the alleyway which leads directly to the Moonlight Lounge

Karaoke would be set up on the same system yes. We do have an app for the karaoke so you'd just use our tablet for that. 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 10:48 AM Nya Munnick <nyamunnick@gmail.com> wrote:
Hi!

Updated headcount is 40 people. I would like to order catering as well please, and go with the appetizer option for $6 a person. 

Would it be possible to offer 2 custom drink options at the bar? Here's what I was thinking: 
- Somaek (30% grape soju 70% beer) 
- French 75 (https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a38848982/french-75-cocktail/) 

If these two options are possible, would I be able to bring in a mini sign to promote these menu items or do you have something I could use?

Also, is the only entry/exit into Moonlight Lounge through Taco Taco? I just want to be able to provide my guests with clear instructions as I was a little confused myself when I visited last week. 

Lastly, does the Karaoke set up to the same speaker that my phone would be connected to for music? 

Thank you! 

On Sat, Nov 16, 2024 at 2:49 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Nya,

We're so excited for your birthday party at the Moonlight Lounge on November 22nd from 9:00 PM to 1:00 AM!  We received your deposit and you're all set. To help us finalize the arrangements, could you please give us an updated headcount?

Also, would you like catering? We can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference.

We look forward to seeing you for your venue visit on November 14th at 8 PM! Let us know if you have any other questions.


Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

subject: RE: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26
text:
Hi Taco Taco Team,

Thank you for confirming the nut allergy. Is there avocado or avocado oil in any of the dishes? And are you able to label the food items?

For drinks, can you provide 100 drink tickets just in case extra people show up. We will give you back what you do not use.

For dessert, what other options do you have? Can you do a fruit platter (vegan)?

Thank you so much. We are looking forward to next week 😊

Regards,

Karima Dia (She/her) | Event Sales Specialist |  Evergreen  | +1 289-904-2099
Evergreen Brick Works, 550 Bayview Ave., Suite 300, Toronto, ON M4W 3X8

Transforming public spaces for the health of people and our planet.

evergreen.ca<https://www.evergreen.ca/?utm_campaign=email_signature&utm_source=evergreen&utm_medium=correspondence>  | LinkedIn<http://www.linkedin.com/company/evergreen-canada>  |  Instagram<https://www.instagram.com/evergreencanada>

Help support our flood recovery efforts at Evergreen Brick Works by giving today<https://evergreen.donorsupport.co/page/floodrecovery>.

Evergreen values and supports flexible work.  I’m sending this email at a time that suits my personal circumstances and working style.  I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it.

From: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Sent: November 21, 2024 3:11 PM
To: Karima Dia <kdia@evergreen.ca>
Cc: Heather Walthers <hwalthers@evergreen.ca>
Subject: Re: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26

Sorry just cc'ing Heather here as well as I missed her in the last email.

Coat check can be added to the final bill, yes!

Also, I don't think we serve affogato anymore, apologies for that. Is there anything else you'd prefer? Unfortunately I don't think any of our dessert can be made vegan, so you're welcome to bring some vegan desserts if you'd like!

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768<https://www.google.com/search?q=tacotaco&oq=tacotaco&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIJCAEQABgKGIAEMhIIAhAuGAoYrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyEAgDEC4YrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyCQgEEAAYChiABDIHCAUQABiABDIGCAYQRRg9MgYIBxBFGEHSAQgxNjc3ajBqN6gCALACAA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8> | info@eattaco.ca<mailto:info@eattaco.ca>

On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 3:07 PM <info@eattaco.ca<mailto:info@eattaco.ca>> wrote:
Hi Karima,

Thank you for your email and the updates.

**Allergies:**
* We can confirm that we do not use any peanut or nuts in our kitchen, so no worries on that!

**Bar:** Your plan to set up a table with drink tickets upon arrival works perfectly for us. We will supply the drink tickets. To confirm, 90 drink tickets is what you'll need?

Thanks,
TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Karima Dia

Subject: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26
Hi Liem & Taco Taco Team,

I hope you are doing well. I'm following up on the email below regarding the selected menu options and allergy information.

A few updates:

  *   Our guest count is now 90.
  *   In addition to the peanut allergy mentioned earlier, we now have a guest with an allergy to all nuts. Could you confirm which menu items contain these ingredients? Also, are you able to label each item accordingly?

For the bar, will you be supplying the drink tickets, or should we bring our own? Our plan is to set up a table with the staff list and provide each guest with one drink ticket upon arrival. Please let me know if this works for you.

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Karima Dia (She/her) | Event Sales Specialist |  Evergreen  | +1 289-904-2099
Evergreen Brick Works, 550 Bayview Ave., Suite 300, Toronto, ON M4W 3X8

Transforming public spaces for the health of people and our planet.

Help support our flood recovery efforts at Evergreen Brick Works by giving today<https://evergreen.donorsupport.co/page/floodrecovery>.

Evergreen values and supports flexible work.  I’m sending this email at a time that suits my personal circumstances and working style.  I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it.

From: Karima Dia
Sent: November 15, 2024 2:58 PM
To: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca<mailto:info@eattaco.ca>>
Cc: Heather Walthers <hwalthers@evergreen.ca<mailto:hwalthers@evergreen.ca>>
Subject: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26

Hi Liem,

I hope you are doing well. I wanted to submit our catering order and provide you with the RSVP numbers. We going to send a reminder on Monday and will have the final RSVP by the end of next week.

Guest count: 58 people

Menu Choices:  Buffet Menu $30 per person
Desserts: Churros, Affogato- do you have a vegan option?
Mains: Butternut squash tacos (v), jerk chicken tacos, shrimp tacos
Apps: Street corn (are we able to have some with vegan mayo or mayo & sour cream on the side)? Cauliflower wings, Roasted potatoes ( mayo on the side or omitted for some).
Sides: Mexican rice, fries with ketchup on the side.

We have a staff member that is allergic to avocados, and one is allergic to peanuts,  All nuts. Can you advise which items will have these ingredients. Are you able to label each item on the buffet table and what is in them? Similar to the descriptions you have on the website.

I also wanted to note that we will be covering coat check. Can this be billed to the final bill?

Thank you so much and let me know if you have any questions.

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu<http://eattaco.ca/menu>. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

html:
Hi Taco Taco Team,

 

Thank you for confirming the nut allergy. Is there avocado or avocado oil in any of the dishes? And are you able to label the food items?

 

For drinks, can you provide 100 drink tickets just in case extra people show up. We will give you back what you do not use.

 

For dessert, what other options do you have? Can you do a fruit platter (vegan)?

 

Thank you so much. We are looking forward to next week 😊

 

Regards,

 

Karima Dia (She/her) | Event Sales Specialist |  Evergreen  | +1 289-904-2099 

Evergreen Brick Works, 550 Bayview Ave., Suite 300, Toronto, ON M4W 3X8  


Transforming public spaces for the health of people and our planet. 

 

evergreen.ca  | LinkedIn  |  Instagram 

 

Help support our flood recovery efforts at Evergreen Brick Works by giving today. 

  

Evergreen values and supports flexible work.  I’m sending this email at a time that suits my personal circumstances and working style.  I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it. 

 

From: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Sent: November 21, 2024 3:11 PM
To: Karima Dia <kdia@evergreen.ca>
Cc: Heather Walthers <hwalthers@evergreen.ca>
Subject: Re: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26

 

Sorry just cc'ing Heather here as well as I missed her in the last email.

 

Coat check can be added to the final bill, yes!

 

Also, I don't think we serve affogato anymore, apologies for that. Is there anything else you'd prefer? Unfortunately I don't think any of our dessert can be made vegan, so you're welcome to bring some vegan desserts if you'd like!


TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

Thank you for your email and the updates.

**Allergies:**
* We can confirm that we do not use any peanut or nuts in our kitchen, so no worries on that!

**Bar:** Your plan to set up a table with drink tickets upon arrival works perfectly for us. We will supply the drink tickets. To confirm, 90 drink tickets is what you'll need?

Thanks,
TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Karima Dia

Subject: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26

Hi Liem & Taco Taco Team,

 

I hope you are doing well. I'm following up on the email below regarding the selected menu options and allergy information.

 

A few updates:

  • Our guest count is now 90.
  • In addition to the peanut allergy mentioned earlier, we now have a guest with an allergy to all nuts. Could you confirm which menu items contain these ingredients? Also, are you able to label each item accordingly?

 

For the bar, will you be supplying the drink tickets, or should we bring our own? Our plan is to set up a table with the staff list and provide each guest with one drink ticket upon arrival. Please let me know if this works for you.

Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.



TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu<http://eattaco.ca/menu>. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.


TacoTaco Events Team

html:
Hi Liem & Taco Taco Team,

 

I hope you are doing well. I'm following up on the email below regarding the selected menu options and allergy information.

 

A few updates:

  • Our guest count is now 90.
  • In addition to the peanut allergy mentioned earlier, we now have a guest with an allergy to all nuts. Could you confirm which menu items contain these ingredients? Also, are you able to label each item accordingly?

 

For the bar, will you be supplying the drink tickets, or should we bring our own? Our plan is to set up a table with the staff list and provide each guest with one drink ticket upon arrival. Please let me know if this works for you.

 

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you.

 

Karima Dia (She/her) | Event Sales Specialist |  Evergreen  | +1 289-904-2099 

Evergreen Brick Works, 550 Bayview Ave., Suite 300, Toronto, ON M4W 3X8  


Transforming public spaces for the health of people and our planet. 

 

evergreen.ca  | LinkedIn  |  Instagram 

 

Help support our flood recovery efforts at Evergreen Brick Works by giving today. 

  

Evergreen values and supports flexible work.  I’m sending this email at a time that suits my personal circumstances and working style.  I respect your working pattern and do not expect you to respond outside of it. 

 

From: Karima Dia
Sent: November 15, 2024 2:58 PM
To: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Cc: Heather Walthers <hwalthers@evergreen.ca>
Subject: RE: New Event Inquiry- Evergreen- Nov 26

 

Hi Liem,

 

I hope you are doing well. I wanted to submit our catering order and provide you with the RSVP numbers. We going to send a reminder on Monday and will have the final RSVP by the end of next week.

 

Guest count: 58 people

 

Menu Choices:  Buffet Menu $30 per person

Desserts: Churros, Affogato- do you have a vegan option?

Mains: Butternut squash tacos (v), jerk chicken tacos, shrimp tacos  

Apps: Street corn (are we able to have some with vegan mayo or mayo & sour cream on the side)? Cauliflower wings, Roasted potatoes ( mayo on the side or omitted for some).

Sides: Mexican rice, fries with ketchup on the side.

 

We have a staff member that is allergic to avocados, and one is allergic to peanuts,  All nuts. Can you advise which items will have these ingredients. Are you able to label each item on the buffet table and what is in them? Similar to the descriptions you have on the website.

 

I also wanted to note that we will be covering coat check. Can this be billed to the final bill?

 

Thank you so much and let me know if you have any questions.

 

Karima Dia (She/her) | Event Sales Specialist |  Evergreen  | +1 289-904-2099

From: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Sent: October 28, 2024 12:04 PM
To: Karima Dia <kdia@evergreen.ca>
Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Hi Karima,

 

Hope you had a great weekend as well! Apologies for delay in response, absolutely - we can put a hold on November 26th for you. We will also let you know if there's any other inquiries that come in, but you have a hold until Nov 1st. 

 

To secure the space, we send you a contract to review, and if all looks good, we ask for a deposit of 50% of the rental fee to secure it. Our preference is e-transfer but we can take credit card payment too (just FYI there is a 2.8% card fee on it). For cancellations, you can get a full refund up to 3 weeks prior to the event, but there can be some flexibility with that given you're close to the 3 week timeframe. Rescheduling the event incurs no penalty, it's just based on availability. For set-up, we allow up to 45 mins prior to the event to set-up.

 

If you'd like, I can send you a contract so your team has it while reviewing/finalizing? I'd just need to know the timeframe you're looking to book so I can add it to the contract.


TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

From: Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca>
Sent: October 24, 2024 2:52 PM
To: Meghan Brazil <mbrazil@evergreen.ca>
Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Oh I'm so sorry! You're looking at November 26th - I was looking at the wrong day. Yes it is available.  The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions

 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.



TacoTaco Events Team

(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 

eattaco.ca

On Sat, Nov 2, 2024 at 7:14 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Andrew,

Thank you for reaching out to TacoTaco Events! 

The Moonlight Lounge is a great space for a fundraiser and absolutely can accommodate a group of your size. We have a spacious dance floor that your students could utilize for their performances. We also have a full sound system with a Bluetooth connection and karaoke, so your students can plug in and play their music.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person.  Let me know what package you're interested in  and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

And yup! It's accessible for students.

For the Moonlight Lounge, our rental rate is $125 per hour on Sundays or minimum spend of $1,000. This includes our additional services such as a private bar, dance floor, sound system, and more.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Warmly,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Andrew Tribe

Subject: Taco Taco Event Space

Good morning, 

My name is Andrew Tribe and I am the Artistic Director of the Mainstage Theatre Company in Toronto. We are a not-for-profit youth theatre company that mounts two productions per year in Toronto with youth ages 11 - 21. 

We are looking to host a fundraiser at the end of our year to celebrate the year's accomplishments and look towards the future. We also hope we can have a few of our students perform some songs (with keyboard accompaniment). Your space came recommended by one of our staff members! :) 

Our tentative dates would be either the evening of Sunday, June 1, 2025 or Sunday, June 8, 2025. 

We would be interested in the Moonlight Lounge space (194). 

What can you share about food? Is the space accessible for all ages? What is the approximate cost? 

Our company is operated by a Board of Directors, so as much info you can provide, I can relay it back to them. 

Thank you so much! 

Warmly,
Andrew. 

Andrew Tribe (he/him)
Artistic Director
Mainstage Theatre Company
360A Bloor St W, PO Box 68513 Walmer
Toronto, ON  M5S 3C9
E. andrew@mainstagetheatre.com
W. mainstagetheatre.com

subject: Lopii Productions/ Catering and Bar Package
text:
Hi Liem,

Thank you for our conversation yesterday afternoon.

I wanted to start a new email thread to confirm the catering and drink
options for our event next Thursday. Could you please let me know which
appetizers on your menu are gluten-free? This information will help us in
making our decision.

Additionally, I have a question about the bar package. If we opt for an
open bar tab along with the catering package, will the venue fee be waived
for exceeding the minimum requirements? I’m unclear on how that works.

Thank you so much for your assistance! We look forward to our event.

Best,
Georgina
--
*Georgina López (She/Her)*
*CEO, Executive Producer*
*www.lopiiproductions.com <http://www.lopiiproductions.com/>*
Instagram <https://www.instagram.com/lopiiproductions/>, Linked In
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/lopii-productions-inc/>, Facebook
<https://www.facebook.com/LopiiProductions/>, Twitter
<https://twitter.com/lopii_prod>



"In a World where you can be Anything. Be Kind."

Hi Liem,

Thank you for our conversation yesterday afternoon. 

I wanted to start a new email thread to confirm the catering and drink options for our event next Thursday. Could you please let me know which appetizers on your menu are gluten-free? This information will help us in making our decision.

Additionally, I have a question about the bar package. If we opt for an open bar tab along with the catering package, will the venue fee be waived for exceeding the minimum requirements? I’m unclear on how that works.

Thank you so much for your assistance! We look forward to our event.

Best,  
Georgina
--

On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 12:42 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

> Hi Cierra,
>
> Thanks for your email! To answer your questions:
>
> **Drink Tickets:** Drink tickets are for only alcoholic beverages, to be
> fair to you, since the cost of each ticket being $8 whereas pop is $2.
> Having a tab for non-alcoholic drinks would be the most value!
>
> **Prosecco Pricing:** It would likely be about $45 for each bottle but
> I'll need to double check. Expect it to be in that range
>
> Best,
>
> TacoTaco Events Team
> 647-692-4768
>
> ----- Original Message -----
>
> From: Cierra Phillips
>
> Subject: Re: Event Contract 05/03/2025
> Thanks for clarifying!
>
> Quick question about drink tickets - are these only for alcoholic drinks
> or for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic? Or would it be possible to have a
> 'tab' for non-alcoholic drinks and then do drink tickets just for alcoholic
> drinks?
>
> Also for the prosecco, if we had you order them in advance as we chatted
> about.. what would the cost be for each of these per bottle:
> - https://www.lcbo.com/en/freixenet-cordon-negro-brut-cava-216945
> - https://www.lcbo.com/en/romeo-prosecco-21434
> We probably need 2-3 cases.
>
> I know we have a while to decide these things, just want to get our ducks
> in a row so we are just finalizing things when we get closer to the date.
>
> Thanks,
>
> On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 6:23 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
>
>> Hi Cierra,
>>
>> The maximum for our space is 194 guests! Given our talk yesterday I
>> wouldn't worry about it unless you were looking to invite a lot more.
>>

On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 12:42 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Cierra,

Thanks for your email! To answer your questions:

**Drink Tickets:** Drink tickets are for only alcoholic beverages, to be fair to you, since the cost of each ticket being $8 whereas pop is $2. Having a tab for non-alcoholic drinks would be the most value! 

**Prosecco Pricing:** It would likely be about $45 for each bottle but I'll need to double check. Expect it to be in that range 

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Cierra Phillips

Subject: Re: Event Contract 05/03/2025

Thanks for clarifying!

Quick question about drink tickets - are these only for alcoholic drinks or for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic? Or would it be possible to have a 'tab' for non-alcoholic drinks and then do drink tickets just for alcoholic drinks?

Also for the prosecco, if we had you order them in advance as we chatted about.. what would the cost be for each of these per bottle:
- https://www.lcbo.com/en/freixenet-cordon-negro-brut-cava-216945
- https://www.lcbo.com/en/romeo-prosecco-21434
We probably need 2-3 cases.

I know we have a while to decide these things, just want to get our ducks in a row so we are just finalizing things when we get closer to the date.

Thanks,

On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 6:23 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Cierra,

The maximum for our space is 194 guests! Given our talk yesterday I wouldn't worry about it unless you were looking to invite a lot more.

Hi Liem, 

Thank you for sending. Please find attached, the signed contract along with a copy of my photo ID. A $250 has also been transferred as part of my deposit. 

All looks good, other than the catering, drink package, and karaoke that I have updated onto the contract. I will have to discuss with the others on what catering or drink package they prefer. Am I able to give you this detail closer to the date of the event? Or is this information that you would require at the point in time? 

For the catering option, I was wondering how the light appetizers are distributed and accounted for? Would qualities last to feed all guest? Would there be an option to add on the order if need be? 

As for the drink package, I was also considering the Open bar tab. If a limit is prearranged, does amount get deducted based on the number, type, and cost of drinks ordered? Are there any restrictions on the drinks that the guest can order from? 

Thanks for your input! 

Regards, 

Marytoni Delos Reyes

-----Original Message-----

Sent: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 3:40 PM
To: Delos Reyes, Marytoni <Marytoni.DelosReyes@tdsb.on.ca>
Subject: Event Contract 01/25/2025

TDSB WARNING - EXTERNAL EMAIL: This message comes from an external organization. Do NOT reply, click links (embedded links) or open attachment(s) unless you recognize the sender email address. Also, NEVER provide your username and password as a result of an emailed request.



Hi Mary Toni,

        Please see attached for the event contract. The contract has been pre-filled but if you can't see the details, please view the contract on a computer rather than a phone. Let me know if you have any questions otherwise you can simply respond to this email saying that you accept it, and attach a picture of your ID (we only need a picture of your face and your name). To fully reserve the date, please transfer the deposit to info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'January25'.

        TacoTaco Events Team
        TacoTaco
        www.eattaco.ca

On Sat, Nov 2, 2024 at 7:14 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Andrew,

Thank you for reaching out to TacoTaco Events! 

The Moonlight Lounge is a great space for a fundraiser and absolutely can accommodate a group of your size. We have a spacious dance floor that your students could utilize for their performances. We also have a full sound system with a Bluetooth connection and karaoke, so your students can plug in and play their music.

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizza. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person.  Let me know what package you're interested in  and I'll send you the appropriate menu.

And yup! It's accessible for students.

For the Moonlight Lounge, our rental rate is $125 per hour on Sundays or minimum spend of $1,000. This includes our additional services such as a private bar, dance floor, sound system, and more.

Please let me know if you have any further questions.

Warmly,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

----- Original Message -----

From: Andrew Tribe

Subject: Taco Taco Event Space

Good morning, 

My name is Andrew Tribe and I am the Artistic Director of the Mainstage Theatre Company in Toronto. We are a not-for-profit youth theatre company that mounts two productions per year in Toronto with youth ages 11 - 21. 

We are looking to host a fundraiser at the end of our year to celebrate the year's accomplishments and look towards the future. We also hope we can have a few of our students perform some songs (with keyboard accompaniment). Your space came recommended by one of our staff members! :) 

Our tentative dates would be either the evening of Sunday, June 1, 2025 or Sunday, June 8, 2025. 

We would be interested in the Moonlight Lounge space (194). 

What can you share about food? Is the space accessible for all ages? What is the approximate cost? 

Our company is operated by a Board of Directors, so as much info you can provide, I can relay it back to them. 

Thank you so much! 

Warmly,
Andrew. 

Andrew Tribe (he/him)
Artistic Director
Mainstage Theatre Company
360A Bloor St W, PO Box 68513 Walmer
Toronto, ON  M5S 3C9
E. andrew@mainstagetheatre.com

in a row so we are just finalizing things when we get closer to the date.

Thanks,

Thanks for clarifying!

Quick question about drink tickets - are these only for alcoholic drinks or for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic? Or would it be possible to have a 'tab' for non-alcoholic drinks and then do drink tickets just for alcoholic drinks?

Also for the prosecco, if we had you order them in advance as we chatted about.. what would the cost be for each of these per bottle:
- https://www.lcbo.com/en/freixenet-cordon-negro-brut-cava-216945
- https://www.lcbo.com/en/romeo-prosecco-21434
We probably need 2-3 cases.

I know we have a while to decide these things, just want to get our ducks in a row so we are just finalizing things when we get closer to the date.

Thanks,

Hi Liem,

​

The festive holidays are nearly here! Protect your success on Peerspace and continue to drive bookings with these quick tips:

  1. Don’t forget to block your calendar for dates you’re away to avoid requests for when you’re unavailable/out of office.

  2. Maintain your response rate by ensuring someone is looking after your account in your absence or download the Peerspace app to help you reply quickly on the go. Note: Response rate is one of the factors that impacts how high you appear in our search results. Learn more.

  3. Create a templated response to allow you to reply quickly. Here’s one we made:

    "Thank you for your request. We are closed for the festive season, so please allow some time for us to respond to your inquiry. "

Cheers!

- Team Peerspace

subject: Thank you!
text:
Hi Liem/Luan,

I just wanted to say thank you for everything, and also for the thoughtful
gift!

The party was amazing, and your staff was incredible. My guests loved it,
and I have no words to express my gratitude. I really hope I can celebrate
my birthday there again next year.

I just wanted to say thank you for everything, and also for the thoughtful gift!

The party was amazing, and your staff was incredible. My guests loved it, and I have no words to express my gratitude. I really hope I can celebrate my birthday there again next year.


Best Regards,

Wallesca

Thank you for all this info!

I think this all works - let's also say no shots! We will come back to you early next week with a better idea on numbers :) 

Thanks!

On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 1:29 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Ahaha no worries! Just let us know closer to the day of the event, we ask for a final guest count 5 days before the event but minor adjustments up to 24 hours before the event is fine. 

Maybe 1 portion of each app isn't the best way to put it - the servings of the app should be more than enough so guests can freely grab whatever apps they like, ie fries, loaded nachos, and poppers, and have no worry about taking too much. Our serving size for our apps are generally very generous.

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca



On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 1:25 PM Erika Santillana <esantillana@google.com> wrote:
Hi!

For now, the guest count could be 60 or it could be 90 haha. We will confirm. 

For churros, once we have the final numbers we can decide on those. 

Open bar minus cocktails is great. @Rishi Lakhanpal do you want to set a limit on drinks? 

So I understand, everyone gets two tacos, and then one portion of each app ordered? So, there is only enough for 1 portion of each app per person?

Thanks! 

On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 1:13 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Erika and Rishi,

Nice to meet you and thank you for providing your selections! We will send it to our staff so they know ahead of time.

For churros - absolutely! How many orders would you like? 

We bring out servings of apps equivalent to the number of guests coming. The idea is that people can grab a plate and grab their two tacos and any apps they’d like to their plate. You don’t have to provide the final guest count now, we ask for it 5 days prior to the event, but do you have a rough count? 

Absolutely can order more on site! 

For open bar, yes. That’s effectively all our drinks except our cocktails. Would that work for you? And do you want to set a budget or leave it open the whole night?


TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

Taco - Beyond Beef Taco
Taco - TacoTaco Tofu
Taco -  Grilled Chicken Asado
Taco - Carne Steak Asada
App - Crispy Cauliflower Wings
App - French Fries
App - Jalapeno poppers
App - Nachos
App - Loaded Nachos

Dessert: can we add churros separately?

Alcohol: Open bar

A couple of questions: 
1. How many apps would each person get for the $16? It would be 2 tacos and how many apps per person?
2. Can we order more on site if needed? 
3. Can we do open bar but limit to nothing over $14?

Thanks!
Erika

On Fri, 8 Nov 2024 at 16:49, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
Hi Rai,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $1000 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

Let us know if you have any questions

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

* **$6 per person:** Light appetizers. Perfect for birthdays and late night eats.
* **$10 per person:** One taco and appetizers
* **$16 per person:** Two tacos and appetizers.

Let me know which package you're interested in and I can send over a menu.

Absolutely! We can accommodate your guest with Celiac. All of our tacos are gluten-free except the Cod.

You can come by anytime after 5pm to view the space.

Let me know what works best for you.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

TacoTaco Events Team

Hi Rai,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $1000 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

Let us know if you have any questions

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

Hi Alex,

To answer your questions:
* **Regular Food Menu:** Yes, our regular food menu will be available for your guests to order from. Keep in mind our kitchen closes at 10:30pm.
* **End Time:** The 1:00 AM time is when the event ends yes. There's some leniency in guests leaving for 30 mins and clean up!
* **Music Setup:** You can send your Spotify playlist to us in advance so we can have it ready. The sound system uses Bluetooth, so you don't need to physically plug anything in.
* **Patio Access:** Access to the patio is included with your booking. Cornhole is fine, just ensure it is removed by the end of the night.
* **Balloon Setup:** We recommend arriving 30 minutes before your event start time (8:30 pm) to set up your balloons. There may be some dine-in guests still present.
* **Outside Food:** You may bring in cupcakes. 
We look forward to your event! Please send the remaining balance at your earliest convenience.

To fully reserve the date, please transfer the deposit to info@eattaco.ca, with the password 'December10'.

        TacoTaco Events Team
        TacoTaco
        http://www.eattaco.ca/

To: Fatima Mian <Fatima.Mian@D2L.com>

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of D2L. Do not respond to, click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Hi Fatima,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The front dining space is available that day. The cost is $125/hr with a minimum spend of $1000 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. Let me know if you have any questions!

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu<http://eattaco.ca/menu>. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. Let us know if you have any questions.

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team

Hi Georgina,

Thanks for your email! I'm happy to answer your questions about the drink tickets and catering options:

* **Mocktails:** We have six mocktails available and those would be included in the drink ticket price. However, since pop is only $2 each, a drink ticket might not be the most cost-effective option for your guests who prefer soda. We could also set up a bar tab for pop, which might be a more budget-friendly solution.
* **Chips:** Yup! We can dedicated gluten-free fryer.

We appreciate your understanding regarding the chips. Please let us know if you have any other questions!

TacoTaco Events Team

We have different catering and drink packages so it'd likely be easiest just to share those:

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference.

If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. Or, you can set a budget for open bar and people can order from the open bar until that limit is reached.

TacoTaco Events Team

The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $100/hr with a minimum spend of $300 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. For water, coffee, tea or juice, we can have an open tab for you and that can be paid at the end of the night? 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca

Hi there, is it possible to book the day for the Moonlight lounge now and then get the food and drinks sorted closer to the day? When do you need final numbers?

On Oct 23, 2024, at 3:12 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Marlene,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $100/hr with a minimum spend of $300 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. For water, coffee, tea or juice, we can have an open tab for you and that can be paid at the end of the night? 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please let us know. You can check out our full menu at eattaco.ca/menu.

 

Best regards,

 

TacoTaco Events Team

647-692-4768

On Oct 23, 2024, at 3:12 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Hi Marlene,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $100/hr with a minimum spend of $300 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. For water, coffee, tea or juice, we can have an open tab for you and that can be paid at the end of the night? 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

The rental comes with the use of our sound system (including karaoke), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked bar and clean up. 

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you'd like to provide drinks for your guests, you can purchase drink tickets at $8 each + tax & gratuity which covers all our drinks except for the cocktails. For water, coffee, tea or juice, we can have an open tab for you and that can be paid at the end of the night? 

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca 
eattaco.ca

html:
Hi,

No worries! Thanks for sharing this, I’ll check my schedule next week and get back you. 

Great, I was thinking 9pm-1pm. I also had a few questions:
- If I wanted to make a catering order of appetizers for 40 people, am I able to select different options for the apps based on your menu/what does this option come with?
- Do you offer custom drink options at your bar? For example if I wanted my own custom cocktail as an option at the bar for people to order that matches the theme of the party?
- Do you sell bottles (i.e of champagne) that we can purchase from the bar?
- Am I allowed to bring a cake?
- For your sound system, am I able to connect my phone to it?

Thank you!

Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Hi Nya,

 

Thank you for reaching out! We're delighted to hear that you're considering hosting your 26th birthday party with us. I'm pleased to inform you that the Dining Room is available on 2024-11-22 for your event.

 

The Dining Room can accommodate up to 50 guests, which is perfect for your gathering of 40 friends and family. The rental rate is $125 per hour on Fridays, and there is a minimum spend requirement of $1000.

 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please let us know. You can check out our full menu at eattaco.ca/menu.

 

Best regards,

 

TacoTaco Events Team

647-692-4768

Looking forward to hearing back from you,

 

Nya 

 

On Thu, Sep 12, 2024 at 6:59 PM <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:

Subject: Re: New Event Inquiry

 

Hi Nya,

 

Thank you for reaching out! We're delighted to hear that you're considering hosting your 26th birthday party with us. I'm pleased to inform you that the Dining Room is available on 2024-11-22 for your event.

 

The Dining Room can accommodate up to 50 guests, which is perfect for your gathering of 40 friends and family. The rental rate is $125 per hour on Fridays, and there is a minimum spend requirement of $1000.

 

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, please let us know. You can check out our full menu at eattaco.ca/menu.

 

Best regards,

 

TacoTaco Events Team

647-692-4768

Hi Doug,

Thank you for reaching out to us at Taco Taco! We're excited about the possibility of hosting your event at the Moonlight Lounge. Let me answer your queries:

1. **Furniture Availability and Setup**: The Moonlight Lounge comes with booths that could seat up to 32 people. We can provide additional tables and chairs as needed to suit your event setup.

2. **Booking Process**: To move forward with booking a private event, we will draft a contract for your review. Once the agreement is settled, a deposit amounting to half of the rental fee will secure your reservation for the specified date.

We're eager to make your 10th anniversary celebration special. Please let us know if you have any more questions or when you would like to proceed.

Cheers,
TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768

We're eager to make your 10th anniversary celebration special. Please let us know if you have any more questions or when you would like to proceed.
Cheers, 
TacoTaco Events Team

1. **Furniture Availability and Setup**: The Moonlight Lounge comes with booths that could seat up to 32 people. We can provide additional tables and chairs as needed to suit your event setup.

2. **Booking Process**: To move forward with booking a private event, we will draft a contract for your review. Once the agreement is settled, a deposit amounting to half of the rental fee will secure your reservation for the specified date.

We're eager to make your 10th anniversary celebration special. Please let us know if you have any more questions or when you would like to proceed.

Hi Doug,

For food, we can offer light appetizers for $6 per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu for reference. 

Storing cake at our place is fine. And all ages is ok too! We'd just mark the people unable to drink

Hi Doug,

Nice to meet you! My name is Liem and I help with event inquiries here at Tacotaco. We would love to host you. The Moonlight Lounge is available that day, and the cost to rent it is $150/hr with a minimum spend of $1750 across food and drinks. The rental comes with the use of our PA system (including a mic), bartending staff, party lights, a fully stocked cash bar and clean up. Band set-up would be fine but we do have a limitation on how loud it can go (up to 90 dbs) as we have neighbours who complain if it's too loud. Let me know if you have any questions!

TacoTaco Events Team
